24.text: First in the spotlight tonight is the boxer Ricky Hatton.

28.text: He's answering questions on Only Fools And Horses.

33.text: Next, the chef Tony Singh. His specialist subject, tartan.

40.text: The actor and comedian Ardal O'Hanlon

42.text: answering questions on the band Velvet Underground.

48.text: And the antiques expert Kate Bliss on Carl Faberge.

61.text: Hello, and welcome to Celebrity Mastermind with me, John Humphrys.

65.text: The big difference between this and the regular Mastermind

68.text: is that this lot don't only have to worry about the effect

71.text: of the spotlight and the black chair and the ticking clock,

74.text: it's their hard-earned reputations on the line as well.

78.text: And they don't even get paid for it, they're doing it for charity.

83.text: A minute and a half on their specialist subject

85.text: and then two minutes on general knowledge.

88.text: So, let us ask our first contender to join us, please.

- to be able to distinguish...

707.text: about taste and history and whatever else is going on in that region.

714.text: essentially whatever food is on our doorstep.

730.text: so all my Indian cooking is just basically what I've learned from my mum.

733.text: So yeah, it's, er...whatever makes you happy, really.
